duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement predictive, preventative, or planned maintenance programs for power, motor control, process control systems, and pneumatic systems.
Troubleshoot, diagnose, propose, and implement equipment repair activities.
Adhere to electrical work practices and guidelines outlined by relevant organizations.
Utilize maintenance management system to facilitate job plans and record maintenance activities.
Communicate job status and support requirements with co-workers and management.
Ensure adherence to food safety and quality systems.

education_certification.credential: (2) year EET degree, technical/military training, or equivalent experience in electrical or electronics field
